sentences.english: The temperature has not got cesse to rise up.
I keep going round and round in circles and I don't see the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地在繞圈，但我還是沒有看到酒店。

sentences.english: But it still did not put an end to his shivering.
sentences.chinese: 可是他冷顫還是打個不停。
這趟公共汽車中途不停。

sentences.english: It is also continuously and augmentative for the own pressure and weight .
sentences.chinese: 給自己的壓力和分量也是不停的增加的。

sentences.english: The tradeoff is that you take nonlethal damage when you invoke it.
sentences.chinese: 代價是你使用的時候會不停受到淤傷。

sentences.english: This constant choiceless awareness ends all illusions and all hypocrisy.
sentences.chinese: 這種不停的無選擇的覺察終結了所有幻覺和所有虛僞。
博恩斯教授還在不停的顫抖。

sentences.english: The stakes are higher, people are restless, poised for even greater transformation.
sentences.chinese: 人們正馬不停蹄地準備迎接更大的變革。

sentences.english: I rised my head and saw the ceiling was dropping, felt the classroom was sinking.
sentences.chinese: 我擡頭，看見房頂往下塌，感覺教室在不停地下沉。

sentences.english: A steady rain hampered the progress of the work.
sentences.chinese: 持續不停的大雨妨礙了工程的進展。

sentences.english: She is digging away at her mathematics lessons.
sentences.chinese: 她在不停地刻苦鑽研數學。

sentences.english: Water boiled up beneath the bubble, it seethed and spouted.
sentences.chinese: 球體下的海水沸騰起來，不停攪動，噴湧。

sentences.english: I was later told that the dogs in Jinping had been barking at the foreigner running in the streets.
sentences.chinese: 後來有人告訴我，金平的狗見了外國人會叫個不停。

definition: from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
to do one's utmost/with all one's might/at all costs/(to work or fight) as if one's life depends on it
to make a round trip/return journey/back and forth/to and fro/repeatedly
to rotate/to twirl/to run around/to encircle/rotation/(coll.) to speak indirectly/to beat about the bush
